tool_description: Analyzes historical weather time series data to identify trends, seasonal patterns, and anomalies for forecast context.

time_series_data.description: Historical weather values in chronological order

seasonal_period.description: Expected seasonal cycle length in data points

error_messages: Data length mismatch: time_series_data and timestamps must have the same length.
Insufficient data: Need at least 30 data points for meaningful time series analysis.
Invalid analysis type: Use supported analysis types like trend, seasonality, anomalies, autocorrelation.
Invalid seasonal period: seasonal_period must be a positive integer less than half the data length.
Data quality issue: Time series contains too many gaps or invalid values for analysis.
usage: Provide time_series_data with corresponding timestamps and variable_name. Optionally specify analysis_types and seasonal_period. Returns comprehensive time series analysis results.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable

analysis_summary.description: Summary of key time series characteristics
